categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: An "ancient and evil people" was how the Muza species described the former inhabitants of the Kabus-Dabeh ruins on the planet Muzara. This civilization left behind great ruins, which included a pyramid with fearsome-looking statues on it. By 4000 BBY, this ancient people had disappeared, leaving only Kabus-Dabeh to mark their former existence.
